nodes.text: Bith beans were a type of vegetable that were used in cooking and could be eaten by members of the Besalisk species. The Besalisk chef Dexter Jettster's eatery, Dex's Diner, sold baked Bith beans as a dinner side dish for 3.5. They were served at the diner, which was located in the CoCo Town district of the planet Coruscant, at some point prior to the establishment's destruction during the first two years of the Galactic Empire's rule.

Bith beans were first mentioned in the 2009 StarWars.com Hyperspace exclusive article, "Dining at Dex's," which was written by Gregory Walker in the form of an in-universe menu for Dex's Diner. The article did not make clear if there was any connection between the beans and the Bith species.
